entries.question: When Jesus ascended to heaven what did He give to His church?
entries.authorNote: All men did not receive the same gifts, but to every servant of the Master some gift of the Spirit is promised.” (COL 327)

entries.question: It is important that we understand these gifts?
entries.authorNote: The promise (of Matthew 28:19, 20) is as far-reaching as the commission. Not that all the gifts are imparted to each believer. The Spirit divides 'to every man severally as He will'. 1 Corinthians 12:11. But the gifts of the Spirit are promised to every believer according to his need for the Lord’s work. The promise is just as strong and trustworthy now as in the days of the apostles.” (DA 823)
